data.text: @_thecurly1 We are sorry to hear your frustrations, Angel. For us to further check on your concern, send an email thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XT0nnK). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.

@Simion03924829 Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, The Moon. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@iamhazel888 You're most welcome! Have a great day ahead!

@enzodeguzman Kindly send it here instead or send the details of your concern through: https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and ask Charlie to connect you with the live agent. Our team will be glad to assist you. Thank you!
@enzodeguzman HI Enzo. As checked, website is up and working. May we have the screenshot of the issue encountered so we can check? Thanks.

@iamhazel888 Thank you for raising the concern, @iamhazel888. To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@cthrnx_ HI cthrnx_! May we clarify your concern so we can assit you? Please send us a message through Charlie. Visit https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi, click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents. Stay safe!
@athensgarrote Thank you for your appreciation, Athens!

@wandermari07 Hi WanderMari! If you are looking for a specific fare, route and/or flight schedule, please visit our website at https://t.co/kPgrcWBdZU.  For the latest seat sale, you may refer to https://t.co/kGsg6DVSI3. Thank you and hope to see you onboard!

@onezeronine2 Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, Kenneth. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@mingoolovee In case CEB Super Pass is unavailable on your intended date of departure, you may opt to avail of CEB’s year-round low fares instead and use your CEB Super Pass for other upcoming trips. For more info, kindly check this link: https://t.co/C67eV6f1rH. Hope this helps. Thanks!

urls.title: Cebu Pacific - CEB Super Pass
urls.description: We heard you, everyJuan! The CEB Super Pass is back, until October 13, 2022 only! Buy as many one-way vouchers as you can and fly to any Philippines destination, anytime! Terms and conditions apply. We've reached the maximum number of passes sold. This was a great run! Super thank you! CEB Super Pass selling period has ended. Check out our Seat Sale page for more offers! Redeem your voucher and book a flight to any Philippine destination! Redemption Period: October 10, 2022 to November 23, 2023 Travel

data.text: @mingoolovee Flights on which you may use your CEB Super Pass is subject to availability during redemption. You may check for the actual availability at flight search and choose from the flights marked with “CEB Super Pass”.

@GirlHailang Hi there, GirlHailang! For now, please visit 
https://t.co/wngAzjsY1k to check our latest promotional fares. We hope to see you on board soon!

@KarunaBhardwa18 We are sorry for the inconvenience, Karuna. Thank you as well for raising the concern. We already sent a follow-up to the handler of your request under case number 7250923. Please monitor your email for the update. Thank you
@AdamSese15 Yes. DSWD only required if flight is International and if flight is departing from Davao.
@Chelle95781196 You're welcome and have a great day ahead!
@johnny_nielo You can use your travel fund during initial booking. On payment page, select Travel Fund as your form of payment. Thank you.
@AdamSese15 It is alright, Adam. On the day of the flight, kindly present a valid ID of guest. Thank you.

@_thecurly1 We are sorry to hear about this, _thecurly1. We understand your concern. However, if your booking was already cancelled for Travel Fund, refund is no longer allowed. We hope for your kind understanding on this matter.

@loureenates Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, Loureen. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@Chelle95781196 Hi Chelle! No need to give a copy of the card. Just make sure the booking is complete, correct and confirmed. Thank you

@vien_1104 Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, Vien. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@Chelle95781196 Hi Chelle. Yes, you may use your friend's credit card for booking online. Thanks!

data.text: @johnny_nielo I'm sorry to hear this Johnny. Fares are subject to availability. First come first served basis.

@Tristanified Hi Tristanito. I'm sorry to hear about this. We recommend that prior accessing our website, please clear your cache, delete your cookies. Also, try a different browser and device. If you're using the app, ensure that the app is updated or, uninstall then reinstall. Thanks!

@Roniverse1 Hi Roniverse. Philhealth ID (PVC type) will be accepted as Valid identification for domestic flight.  Remember, all  documents/ IDs presented are subject to airports discretion and profiling.  Thanks!
@ShayneInPoCo HI ShayneInPoCo. Let me see if I can have this expedited. I'll request for a case owner to get in touch with you soon. Kindly wait for our reply.  Thanks for your patience!

@islaisly We will help you look into it isla. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.

data.text: @kaeshadolfo Hi Kaesha! Tel here. Flights on which you may use your CEB Super Pass is subject to availability during redemption.

@BobReye68206730 I'm sorry to hear about this experience Bob. As much as we want to continue our flights, there are cases or circumstances beyond our control or for reasons of safety and security. To view your options, please refer to this link: https://t.co/k9grG8Zhi4. Stay safe!

@itsharoldcorrea We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience 
𝐈𝐚𝐧. At any time after a booking has been made, we may change our schedules and/or cancel any flight where we reasonably consider this to be justified by circumstances beyond our control or for reasons of safety and security.

@kaiixx94 We are sorry to hear your frustrations, asuka. Thank you also for raising the concern. To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@centrostile03 Hi rove! Hi there! We're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@theadelantad0 postpone or reschedule or delay any flight where we reasonably consider this to be justified by circumstances beyond our control or for reasons of safety and security. We hope for your kind understanding on this matter.

@theadelantad0 We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience. I understand your concern. As agreed to the Terms and Conditions upon purchase we may change our schedules and/or cancel, terminate, divert,
@AnnEastHigh You're welcome, AnnEast. Have a great day!
@AnnEastHigh Not necessary,  AnnEastHigh.

@_gippeum_ce Hi Joyce! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@AnnEastHigh Hi AnnEastHigh! Perfume is accepted for hand carry. Make sure that it won't exceed to 100ml container label, otherwise subject for check-in. Hope this helps!

@gnvvpbnn We are sorry to hear this, gnvvpbnn. Allow us to check on it. For assistance and security of your personal information, please send us a message through Charlie. Visit https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK, click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents.

data.text: @ElN3groAndr3s Year-round Promo Fares the senior citizen will only be exempted from paying the 12% value-added tax (VAT).

@ElN3groAndr3s Please be advised that Senior Citizen discount may only be availed for domestic flights for Filipino citizens and this is applicable only for base fare of Go Fares and selected Year-round. However, if fare to avail is a promo or
@ElN3groAndr3s We are sorry but you can only avail the student discount if you book thru ticket offices along with the required documents. Senior Citizen discount is different.

@ElN3groAndr3s Yes. It is located in Terminal 3 Level 3, Departure Hall, Naia Terminal 3, Andrews Ave., Pasay City
Monday to Sunday 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM.
@aikobm Hi aikobm! Chance passenger are subject for approval and availability. Kindly approach our counter staff for assistance. Thank you.

@ElN3groAndr3s The following documents must be presented upon purchase:
Current validated enrollment form or
Duly issued school identification card
And any of the following:
Birth Certificate
Baptismal Certificate
Latest School Records (Form 137)
Naturalization Certificate or
Passport
@ElN3groAndr3s Hi ElNegro! The discount can only be availed through organic ticket offices since there will be documentary requirements check.

data.text: @Azor00176812 Hi Azor! Yes you may. Same rate with child.  Simply go to https://t.co/0v117OfgBW to select your travel dates and destination, and follow the steps from there. Fares are subject to availability. First come first served basis. Hope to see you on board soon!

@jooon_cai I'm sorry to hear that you haven't received your refund yet xcai. We will help you look into it. We encourage you to message us via Charlie the chatbot thru this link: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK, and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent.

@dvlulune Hi Le. We will be glad to look into your concern. To further assist you and the security of your personal information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru: https://t.co/zvAz6wDXJv, and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Thanks!

data.text: @Roniverse1 You're most welcome Roniverse!

@jayrmorales1 We are sorry if you are having a hard time 
Jay☆aRe͡. You may kindly accomplish our Guest Feedback Form thru this link https://t.co/7yR2XT0nnK and we will respond to you through the email you provided.

@MoneyMaRce Hi Mon. TV is not allowed for checked baggage.  To arrange shipment and for direct assistance, you may directly contact Cargo team thru  (02) 8802-7070 open daily from 0900H-1830H and cargocare@cebupacificair.com. Thanks!

data.text: @Rayanne16388571 Hi, Rayanne!  Bern here. Thank you for your interest! You may check on our existing promotional fares in our website https://t.co/wngAzjsqbM. See you on-board!

@jondcyrd Hi Jond! Bern here. Fares are subject to availability. First come first served basis. You may check on our existing promotional fares in our website https://t.co/wngAzjsqbM. See you on-board! Hope to see you on board soon!
@lanceparra_ To view your options, please refer to this link: https://t.co/k9grG8YJsw. Stay safe!

@lanceparra_ I'm sorry to hear this FrancIIIs. At any time after a booking has been made, we may change our schedules and/or cancel any flight where we reasonably consider this to be justified by circumstances beyond our control or for reasons of safety and security.

@marcy9496 Hi Marcy! Fares are subject to availability. First come first served basis. You may check and search for the lowest fare for your preferred flight and schedule thru our website at https://t.co/kPgrcWAGam . Hope to see you on board soon!

@missyanleale Please do not hesitate to send us a message via Charlie the chatbot on the Cebu Pacific website, start chatting anytime and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent and we will be glad to assist you on your concern. Thanks!
@missyanleale HI Yan! Tel here. Regret if you feel that way. Rest assured that we continue to listen and improve our services so we can deliver the best experience for everyJuan.

#LetsFlyJuansMore with Cebu Pacific’s widest domestic network for as low as P88 (one-way base fare, exclusive of fees and surcharges)! You can even fly as soon as you book! Travel period is from Nov 16, 2022-Feb 28, 2023! Book now until Nov 30, 2022 via https://t.co/taKDgpVdRC! https://t.co/wPEssZh2kI
